"Guiden": "Heh, I thought you'd say as much."
"It's easy to just tell you to aim for greater heights, but the process itself is another story."
"First, I want you to fully master a class. It doesn't matter which one you pick."
"Defeating enemies is one way, but clever use of Trainia and Battledia are good as well."
"If you haven't yet visited a Battledia, I recommend trying it out at least once."
"When you feel like you can't improve any further, come see me once again."
"Now go, and good luck. I'll be waiting to hear the good news."
